title: FAQ
text: Por padrão, o R espera que um arquivo seja baixado em até 60 segundos. Ao baixar algum arquivo muito grande ou com uma conexão com Internet lenta, o tempo necessário para download será maior. Neste caso, você verá uma mensagem de warning semelhante esta: Para corrigir isto, é bem simples: aumente o tempo de tolerância R para downloads. Exemplo: tolerância de 2 minutos.
code: 1: In utils::download.file(file, temp, mode = "wb", method = "libcurl") :   downloaded length 12260742 != reported length 30474112 2: In utils::download.file(file, temp, mode = "wb", method = "libcurl") :   URL 'ftp://ftp.datasus.gov.br/dissemin/publicos/SINAN/DADOS/FINAIS/DENGBR10.dbc': Timeout of 60 seconds was reached options(timeout = 120)

title: FAQ
text: O download dos dados através pacote é realizado em memória. Isto significa que cada arquivo baixado DataSUS é lido e armazenado na memória RAM computador. Caso você esteja baixando muitos arquivos, para vários estados e anos, você irá precisar de mais memória RAM disponível. Um modo de contornar este problema é realizar o download e armazenar os resultados em um banco de dados, como SQLite, DuckDB ou outro. Abaixo segue um exemplo de como fazer isso.

what: Cria conexão com o banco de dados
title: FAQ

what: Realiza download e pré-processamento dos dados em loop
title: FAQ
code: anos <- c(2019, 2020) meses <- 1:12 ufs <- c("AC", "AL", "AP", "AM", "BA", "CE", "DF", "ES",           "GO", "MA", "MT", "MS", "MG", "PA", "PB", "PR", "PE",           "PI", "RJ", "RN", "RS", "RO", "RR", "SC", "SP", "SE",           "TO") for(ano in anos){   for(mes in meses){     for(uf in ufs){       # Baixa o dado para um ano, mês e UF específico       tmp <- fetch_datasus(         year_start = ano, year_end = ano,          month_start = mes, month_end = mes,         uf = uf, information_system = "SIH-RD"       )              # Pré-processamento dos dados       tmp <- process_sih(data = tmp)              # Escreve na tabela "sih" no banco de dados,        # apensando os dados de cada ano e mês       dbWriteTable(conn = conn, name = "sih", value = tmp, append = TRUE)              # Remove a tabela temporária       rm(tmp)     }   } }

what: Exemplo de consulta ao banco de dados,
title: FAQ
text: Uma tabela de quantidade de registrosm, por sexo e causa básica
code: tbl(conn, "sih") %>%   group_by(SEXO, COMPLEX) %>%   summarise(freq = n()) %>%   ungroup() %>%   collect()

title: Download and Process DataSUS Files
text: O pacote para o R microdatasus apresenta funções para download dos arquivos de microdados DataSUS (formato DBC), leitura dos arquivos através pacote read.dbc e pré-processamento para utilização. Nesta última etapa, os rótulos e formato das variáveis são atribuídos e tratados.

title: Download and Process DataSUS Files
text: utilizaço pacote consiste, em geral, uso de duas funções: uma realiza o download dos dados e outra o pré-processamento dos mesmos.

title: Download and Process DataSUS Files
text: O manual para utilização pacote encontra-se na Wiki projeto.
code: library(microdatasus) dados <- fetch_datasus(year_start = 2013, year_end = 2014, uf = "RJ", information_system = "SIM-DO") dados <- process_sim(dados)

what: Sistemas de Informação em Saúde suportados
title: Download and Process DataSUS Files
text: Download: SIM, SINASC, SIH, CNES, SIA, SINAN-DENGUE, SINAN-CHIKUNGUNYA, SINAN-ZIKA, SINAN-MALARIA. Pré-processamento: SIM, SINASC, SIH-RD, CNES-ST, CNES-PF, SINAN-DENGUE, SINAN-CHIKUNGUNYA, SINAN-ZIKA, SINAN-MALARIA.

title: Download and Process DataSUS Files
text: O desenvolvimento deste pacote não seria possível sem função read.dbc criada por Daniela Petruzalek, através pacote read.dbc.

title: Download and Process DataSUS Files
text: Peço aos usuários que citem o pacote sempre que ele utilizado. SALDANHA, Raphael de Freitas; BASTOS, Ronaldo Rocha; BARCELLOS, Christovam. Microdatasus: pacote para download e pré-processamento de microdados Departamento de Informática SUS (DATASUS). Cad. Saúde Pública, Rio de Janeiro , v. 35, n. 9, e00032419, 2019. Available http://ref.scielo.org/dhcq3y.

what: Fetch and read microdata files from DataSUS — fetch_datasus
title: Fetch and read microdata files from DataSUS — fetch_datasus
text: fetch_datasus downloads microdata (DBC) files DataSUS reads .

title: Fetch and read microdata files from DataSUS — fetch_datasus
code: fetch_datasus(   year_start,   month_start = NULL,   year_end,   month_end = NULL,   uf = "all",   information_system,   vars = NULL,   stop_on_error = FALSE,   timeout = 240,   track_source = FALSE )

title: Fetch and read microdata files from DataSUS — fetch_datasus
text: year_start, year_end numeric. Start end year files format yyyy. month_start, month_end numeric. Start end month format mm. parameters used healh information systems SIH, CNES SIA. parameter ignored information health system SIM SINASC. uf optional string vector strings. default UFs ("Unidades Federativas") download. See Details. information_system string. abbreviation health information system accessed. See Details. vars optional string vector strings. default, variables read stored, unless list desired variables informed parameter. stop_on_error logical. TRUE, download process stopped error occurs. timeout numeric (seconds). Sets timeout tolerance downloads, usefull large files /slow connections. Defaults 240 seconds. track_source logical. TRUE, adds column called source downloaded file name.

title: Fetch and read microdata files from DataSUS — fetch_datasus
text: function downloads DBC files DataSUS following parameters start date, end date, UF health information system abbreviation. download process, files merged unique data.frame object. specific UF vector UFs can informed using following abbreviations: "AC", "AL", "AP", "", "BA", "CE", "DF", "ES", "GO", "MA", "MT", "MS", "MG", "PA", "PB", "PR", "PE", "PI", "RJ", "RN", "RS", "RO", "RR", "SC", "SP", "SE", "". following systems implemented: "SIH-RD", "SIH-RJ", "SIH-SP", "SIH-ER", "SIM-", "SIM-DOFET", "SIM-DOEXT", "SIM-DOINF", "SIM-DOMAT", "SINASC", "CNES-LT", "CNES-ST", "CNES-DC", "CNES-EQ", "CNES-SR", "CNES-HB", "CNES-PF", "CNES-EP", "CNES-RC", "CNES-", "CNES-EE", "CNES-EF", "CNES-GM", "SIA-AB", "SIA-ABO", "SIA-ACF", "SIA-AD", "SIA-", "SIA-", "SIA-AQ", "SIA-AR", "SIA-ATD", "SIA-PA", "SIA-PS", "SIA-SAD", "SINAN-DENGUE-FINAL", "SINAN-DENGUE-PRELIMINAR", "SINAN-CHIKUNGUNYA-FINAL", "SINAN-CHIKUNGUNYA-PRELIMINAR", "SINAN-ZIKA-FINAL", "SINAN-ZIKA-PRELIMINAR", "SINAN-MALARIA-FINAL", "SINAN-MALARIA-PRELIMINAR".

title: Fetch and read microdata files from DataSUS — fetch_datasus
text: Internet connection needed use function. year month used download files regards processing month year cases DataSUS. UF regards cases processed DataSUS. files downloaded temporary folder deleted reading process.

title: Fetch and read microdata files from DataSUS — fetch_datasus
code: if (FALSE) { fetch_datasus(year_start = 2010, year_end = 2011,               information_system = "SIM-DO")  fetch_datasus(year_start = 2014, year_end = 2014,               information_system = "SIM-DO",               vars = c("CODMUNRES", "DTOBITO", "CAUSABAS"))  fetch_datasus(year_start = 2014, month_start = 1,               year_end = 2014, month_end = 2,               uf = c("RJ", "MG", "SP", "ES"),               information_system = "SIH-RD") }

title: Process SIA variables from DataSUS — process_sia
text: data data.frame created fetch_datasus(). information_system string. abbreviation health information system. See Details. nome_proced optional logical. TRUE default, add  PA_PROCED_NOME dataset. setting start download file DataSUS retrive updates list procesures (SIGTAB). nome_ocupacao optional logical. TRUE default, add  OCUPACAO name dataset. nome_equipe optional logical. TRUE default, add  EQUIPE name dataset. municipality_data optional logical. TRUE default, creates new variables dataset informing full name details municipality residence.

title: Process SIA variables from DataSUS — process_sia
text: function processes SIA variables retrieved fetch_datasus(), informing labels categoric variables including NA values. Currently, "SIA-PA" supported.

text: data data.frame created fetch_datasus(). municipality_data optional logical. TRUE default, creates new variables dataset informing full name details municipality residence.

title: Process SINAN Malaria variables from DataSUS — process_sinan_malaria
text: function processes SINAN Malaria variables retrieved fetch_datasus(), informing labels categoric variables including NA values.

title: microdatasus 2.3.1
text: Import read.dbc package CRAN. Remove CADGER data. General package adjustments CRAN submission. Examples process functions use data samples. Update package citation.

title: microdatasus 2.3.0
text: process functions uses dplyr verbs dtplyr fast processing. process functions returns tibble. Add track_source argument fetch_datasus function create variable called source file name originated row. Updated CBO (CNES), CADGER (CNES), EQUIPE (SIA), SIGTAB (SIA) reference tables. Sample data health information systems. Data files XZ compression. Internal tests restructured. Progress bar removed process_sim due increased processing time.

title: microdatasus 2.2.7
text: Enhance messages fetch_datasus. Timeout connection check DataSUS FTP reachable. Internet DataSUS FTP reachable, fetch_datasus return NULL. process_sim shows progress bar.

title: microdatasus 2.2.6
text: Age correction SINAN data.

title: microdatasus 2.2.5
text: Patch correct Invalid multibyte string error chikungunya processing.

title: microdatasus 2.2.4
text: process_sia process_sih internally uses now data.table dtplyr

title: microdatasus 2.2.3
text: package {read.dbc} available CRAN, patch uses Github version. Issue #89 points files SIM-EXT older 2006 present 7-digits variable lengths CODMUNRES CODMUNOCOR. codes now truncated 6-digits standard process_sim function. Related #66, #84 #86. files big download, especially SIA SIH. timeout argument added fetch_datasus default 240 seconds. process_sinasc pull request #91 fixes issue #90, related CODOCUPMAE variable Related #79, now function process_sia downloads updated version SIGTAB table DataSUS nome_proced TRUE.

title: microdatasus 2.2.2
text: process_sinasc correct old code missing ESCMAE

title: microdatasus 2.2.1
text: process_sinasc new codes process sex variable, avoiding missing results. process_cnes corrections avoid NA introduction coercion. process_sih corrects MUNIC_RES type

title: microdatasus 2.2.0
text: fetch_datasus function uses read.dbc function .set TRUE better performance. Minor bugs corrections.

title: microdatasus 2.1.3
text: process_cnes uses {data.table} backend performance

title: microdatasus 2.1.2
text: read.dbc back CRAN

title: microdatasus 2.1.1
text: Patch use development version read.dbc package.

title: microdatasus 2.1.0
text: Bug correction impacted download UFs monthly data health systems.

title: microdatasus 2.0.6
text: Updated codes tabNaturalidade SIA-PA fetch files bug corrected.

text: Bug correction download CNES-LT files.

text: Bug correction download UFs.

title: microdatasus 2.0.3
text: SINAN-Dengue bug correction.

title: microdatasus 2.0.2
text: SINASC bug correction (ESCMAE2010).

title: microdatasus 2.0.1
text: Ages minute unit.

title: microdatasus 2.0.0
text: Integrated download old, current, preliminar data.

title: microdatasus 1.0.0
text: Complete overhaul package, meeting current R package standards. functions revised. SIH code tables updated COVID-19. Process CNES ST PF. Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
